JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Scaffolding fitters for the construction of the New Bispebjerg Hospital in Copenhagen
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
The project for the New Bispebjerg Hospital represents a key intervention within the vision proposed by the Capital Region of Denmark for the development of healthcare services in the area. The architectural complex develops in an area of around 77.500 sqm, within six pavilions will host a dense and widely articulated functional program. The three key departments will be: Emergency, Operation, and Radiology.

The New Bispebjerg Hospital represents the perfect union of quality and sustainability, in which the intrinsic plus value is constituted by a concerted and shared work between the various professionals involved.

The construction of the New Bispebjerg Hospital is moving fast, and we need more hands to help keep the process flowing. Therefore, we are looking for Scaffolding fitters to help us getting off the ground

 

The ideal candidate would possess the following attributes:

  • Experience as scaffolding fitter
  • Has the required Danish scaffolding courses
  • Ability to speak conversational English
  • Good at cooperating
  • Ready to work outside in all kinds of weather
  • Experience on a large-scale construction project would be an advantage

 

We can offer:

  • Competitive salary
  • Job start as fast as possible
  • The opportunity to be a part of a large, interesting project
  • Working days with varied tasks and good savings with colleagues
  • An international and multicultural work environment, with a friendly and positive attitude.

If you can see yourself being a part of this project, please send your CV and application to hrdnk@rde.it

Recruitment is ongoing, all personal data will be handled according to GDPR.
